decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive tactics with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly put pressure on the opponent and control the board. Cards like Duress and Go for the Throat help disrupt the opponent's strategy, while creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat and Spyglass Siren provide consistent damage output. Sheoldred, the Apocalypse acts as a powerful finisher, while Anoint with Affliction and Dreams of Steel and Oil offer additional removal options. The mana base is designed to support a mix of black and blue spells, allowing for versatility in gameplay and strategic decision-making.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Omniscience to play spells for free, creating a powerful combo with cards like Temporary Lockdown, Thundertrap Trainer, and Marang River Regent. The deck also includes counterspells like Refute and Spell Pierce to protect the combo pieces and maintain control of the game. Additionally, the deck features cards like Meticulous Archive and Stock Up to help draw into key pieces of the combo. The mana base includes a mix of lands to ensure the deck can consistently cast its spells and execute the combo successfully.

This deck focuses on controlling the board by utilizing a variety of spells and creatures that can disrupt the opponent's strategy. It combines removal spells like Day of Judgment and Get Lost with creatures like Overlord of the Mistmoors and Zur, Eternal Schemer to maintain control of the game. The deck also includes cards like Leyline Binding and Analyze the Pollen to further disrupt the opponent's plans. By utilizing a mix of removal, disruption, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through attrition.

The main concept of this Jeskai Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells. The deck features a mix of cheap aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Abhorrent Oculus, backed up by efficient removal spells like Torch the Tower and Fear of Missing Out. The deck aims to apply pressure early in the game while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells like Spell Pierce. The mana base is optimized for casting spells quickly and efficiently, allowing the deck to maintain a fast-paced aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming your opponent with a combination of low-cost spells and creatures. By consistently casting spells like Burst Lightning and Opt, as well as using creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, you can deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Monstrous Rage to buff your creatures and increase their damage output. With an aggressive playstyle and a focus on tempo, this deck aims to win the game before your opponent has a chance to establish their own board presence.
